query:
INSERT INTO duty_schedules (
                satker_id, user_id,
                schedule_date, start_time, end_time,
                start_at, end_at,
                type, title, notes, created_by
            )
            VALUES (
                $1, $2,
                ($3 AT TIME ZONE 'UTC')::date,
                ($3 AT TIME ZONE 'UTC')::time,
                ($4 AT TIME ZONE 'UTC')::time,
                $3, $4,
                $5, $6, $7, $8
            )
